item.description:
“New Hampshire Legends of Hockey: The History of Hockey in New Hampshire”
Saturday, April 10
At the Millyard Museum
10:30 a.m.-12:00 p.m.
FREE Manchester Historic Association members & members of the New Hampshire Legends of Hockey; $10 general public
(includes museum admission)
Pre-registration is requested.

This talk by local hockey enthusiasts Dick Boucher and Tom Champagne
will explore the rich history of hockey in New Hampshire. Learn about where hockey originated in the state and how it has become one of New Hampshire’s most beloved past times. Boucher and Champagne are members of New Hampshire Legends of Hockey. They will discuss what the organization is doing to promote and protect the history of the sport in New Hampshire.

http://www.nhlegendso...
item.name: "New Hampshire Legends of Hockey: The History of Hockey in New Hampshire"
